VolumeStatus 
=========================================================================
``com.connectsdk.service.capability.VolumeControl.VolumeStatus``

Helper class used with the VolumeControl.VolueStatusListener to return
the current volume status.

Properties
----------

**boolean isMute**

**float volume**

Methods
-------

**VolumeStatus** (boolean *isMute*, float *volume*)
    
    **Parameters:**
        * isMute
        * volume
